tasks.heading: Complete
tasks.content: Prepare and finalize the project proposal document. Include budget estimates and timeline.

tasks.heading: Review Design Mockups
tasks.content: Examine the latest design mockups provided by the UI/UX team. Provide detailed feedback and suggestions.

tasks.heading: Prepare Presentation Slides
tasks.content: Create engaging slides for the upcoming client presentation. Focus on key project highlights and outcomes.
